name: Super Mario Bros. (World 1-1)
description:
This is the first game I ever developed using unity. As this game is in a development state there will be a number of bugs.

HOPE YOU GUYS LIKE IT!!

controls

  • d - go left
  • a - go right
  • s - crouch
  • L-ctrl - fire
  • L-shift - sprint

Pls mention any bugs you found in comments
